branchCategory.name: Low Profile - MHF
branchCategory.description: <p>Gripper series MHF,&nbsp;low profile design, saves space, reduces bending moments and improves accuracy with smooth operation. Available with three standard stroke lengths (short, medium, long) for each bore size.</p>

branchItem.name: MHF2, Air Gripper, 2 Finger, Low Profile
branchItem.description: The low profile design saves space, reduces bending moments and improves accuracy with smooth operation. Available with three standard stroke lengths (short, medium, long) for each bore size.
